statements: SELECT * FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, username, last_login FROM player_accounts WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM player_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'user%';
SELECT player_id, email FROM player_accounts WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, last_login FROM player_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'a%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_id, username, email, last_login FROM player_accounts WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND password <> 'password123';
SELECT * FROM PlayerAccounts;
SELECT username, email FROM PlayerAccounts WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, email, username FROM PlayerAccounts ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT username FROM PlayerAccounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Authentication WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Authentication WHERE auth_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM PlayerAccounts WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_id, last_login FROM Authentication ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM PlayerAccounts;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM PlayerAccounts INNER JOIN Authentication ON PlayerAccounts.player_id = Authentication.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_accounts;
SELECT id, username, email FROM player_accounts ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE game_wins > game_losses;
SELECT player_id, total_games_played FROM player_stats ORDER BY total_games_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT player_id, game_wins, game_losses FROM player_stats ORDER BY game_wins DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_games_played FROM player_stats WHERE total_games_played > 100 ORDER BY total_games_played ASC;
SELECT pa.username, ps.game_wins, ps.game_losses, ps.total_games_played FROM player_accounts pa INNER JOIN player_stats ps ON pa.id = ps.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_id, username, password_hash FROM player_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(games_played) FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING MAX(games_played) > 20;
SELECT player_id, session_id, start_time, end_time FROM player_sessions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, email, password FROM players WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_name, friend_id, status FROM players JOIN player_friends ON players.player_id = player_friends.player_id WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT player_id, login_time, logout_time FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = 3 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
